conversations.conversation: i am a nice and young looking lady who is very caring, loving and kind as well. I am single and on here looking for the right man to spend the rest of my life with. Music, reading, traveling is one most special thing to me i like very much and love spending much time with my love ones on my spare time. i love to socialize that much and make friends as well. I am on here willing to meet someone who is very caring, truthful and trustworthy. Would not love to have someone is a relationship or married,
